participant_1.background:
I listened to my favorite songs on my tablet while getting ready for my last birthday.
i love sushi.
I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.
i visit india often.
I like to draw and paint because it helps me express myself.

participant_2.background:
I am a police officer who has to run after criminals in my boots, but I still enjoy playing basketball in my free time.
I listen to jazz because it's a timeless genre that's perfect for relaxing in my vintage-styled home.
i own a small farm where i herd cattle.
zebras are my favorite animals.
My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How about yourself?
I am doing well, thank you. I just got back from visiting India. I loved it there!
India is a beautiful country! I have always wanted to go there. What was your favorite part of the trip?
My favorite part was visiting the Taj Mahal. It was absolutely breathtaking.
The Taj Mahal is one of the most beautiful buildings in the world. I am glad you had a great time there.
Thank you! I am also a big fan of jazz music. What are your favorite jazz artists?
I love Miles Davis, John Coltrane, and Thelonious Monk. I also enjoy listening to jazz while I work on home improvement projects.
Those are all great artists! I love listening to jazz while I draw and paint.
That is a great way to relax and enjoy some music. I am glad we have some common interests.
Me too! It is always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
I agree! Thank you for chatting with me today. I hope you have a great rest of your day.
